post.text:
"I'm also honored to have the greatest temperament that anybody has." â€”Donald Trump

About that:

comment.author: Tyler
comment.text: That's it. I honestly give up. I have already voted. I am worried that no matter what the out come of this election is...we won't remember what is most important. We are a people...a country...we are one. Let's stop fighting and work together. Is that so hard?

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: And you missed the point of my comment. Let's keep pointing the finger. Good job. NO, We are a people...a country...we are one....

replies.author: Jonathan
replies.text: Tyler then why do you keep voting for the one that keeps dividing us and playing out race and gender and sexual preference etc.? The Democrats love labeling people so that they can pin us all against each other. Think about it. #Trump

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Did I actually say who I voted for? Let me reread my comment...look at that I didn't. Who did I vote for? Jane Powell, you missed the point as well.

replies.author: Lindsay
replies.text: She did not at any point, talk about party affiliation, or mention a candidate by name, or even insinuate that her preference. The point is valid, we all need to be kind to each other, and respect differing opinions.
